Company Overview.Name: Gravita India Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Established in 1992, Gravita India Ltd is one of the largest lead producer in India. The company's business is organized across four specialized verticals: Lead Recycling (flagship), Aluminum recycling, Plastic recycling and Turnkey projects. The company also has expertise in the recycling of used batteries, cable scrap/other Lead scrap, Aluminum scrap, Plastic scrap, etc.
Company Overview.Market Position: One of the largest lead producer in India
